author: larry_evan_slover
post: My name is Larry E. Slover. I have written a song called, The Image on the Cloth. It will be released in a few days. Today is June 27, 2015. The image in the cloth is Jesus the Lord. The burial cloth is the burial cloth of Jesus the Lord. It was my great pleasure to do the song with one of the great singers of our time, Angela Primm, I hope this wonderful song will be able to touch your heart..
title: Timeâ€™s Square
